import React from 'react' import Button from '../../../shared/ui/Button' import handleCardClick from '../../../shared/utils/scroll' const CatalogCard = ({ title, cost, imageUrl }) => { return (
{/* 4:3 Aspect Ratio */}
{title}

до {cost} т.р. / кг

) } export default CatalogCard
